name: Adventure with the Goddess
description:
The adventurer, summoned to the Otherworld, journeys with the goddess Mershana to the Temple of Legends to restore the disrupted balance of the world. Together with the goddess, the adventurer will defeat monsters and have fun with her!

Game Features

Grow your character attributes at random, upgrade your skills and challenge the monsters of the other world!

Gameplay

The goddess can be equipped with multiple skills, including single, ranged and elemental skills.

Use attribute advantage to defeat the monster in front of you!

Choose random attribute growth at the end of the battles. Each run will be a different experience.
Defeat monsters to earn crystals and upgrade different passive skills to create your own unique fighting style!

Rest and have fun with the Goddess on your journey to recover your strength for the continuous challenges ahead!
